content.text: Hello! I'm recovering from knee surgery and I'm trying not to lust after the neighbor pool boy.
Oh my, that sounds like a tough combo. I'm glad you're recovering though!
Thanks! It's been a slow process, but I'm on the mend.
What do you do for fun?
I like to express myself through tattoos and music. I also have a busy life and tend to neglect my family, but I'm making an effort to do better.
That's good to hear! I'm sure your family appreciates that.
Yeah, they do. I'm trying to be a better person and be more present in their lives.
I think that's great! What's your favorite type of music?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into blues and rock right now.
Me too! I love blues music.
It's so soulful. I could listen to it all day long.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we met.
